subject: Re: It gets weird form here!
author: therealrobstone
full_text:
Now we have to establish a "Do-Not-Call" List for paranormal 
telemarketers too? Just when we thought we had it under control. LOL

Rob Stone

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> Hi all;  I got a call, actually my wife got the call since I was at 
work, from a guy claiming he got my phone number from a 'hack' box. It 
could have been fake, but--- I had on my dresser a portable tape deck 
with a session dated 08/03/08, and at the spot I stopped was this 
voice talking about 'John (or jon)' calling. An example maybe of what 
I call "talk as if live", or voices on old tapes talking about the 
present moment. Weeeeeird!
>  
>  This stuff never ceases to amaze me. 
>  
>  F-S
